SELECT qb.*, tp.user_nick as tutor_nick FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_question_board WHERE user_email = #{user_email} AND TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{dateFrom} AND #{dateTo} ) qb, (SELECT tp.*, u.user_nick FROM tbl_tutor_page tp, tbl_user u WHERE tp.user_email = u.user_email) tp WHERE qb.tp_number = tp.tp_number ORDER BY qb.qb_number desc
OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT tb.*, tp.user_nick as tutor_nick FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_tutoring_board WHERE user_email = #{user_email} AND TO_CHAR(tb_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{dateFrom} AND #{dateTo} ) tb, (SELECT tp.*, u.user_nick FROM tbl_tutor_page tp, tbl_user u WHERE tp.user_email = u.user_email) tp WHERE tb.tp_number = tp.tp_number ORDER BY tb.tb_number desc
OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY

OFFSET (#{currPage}-1) * #{amount} ROW FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT TBL_BUY.*, TBL_HAND.H_NAME, TBL_USER.USER_PHONE, TBL_USER.USER_NAME FROM TBL_BUY , TBL_HAND , TBL_USER WHERE TBL_BUY.H_NUMBER = TBL_HAND.H_NUMBER AND TBL_BUY.USER_EMAIL = TBL_USER.USER_EMAIL AND TBL_BUY.B_NUMBER = #{b_number} ORDER BY TBL_BUY.B_DATE DESC
